creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: rectangular off-white fabric with multicolored imagery; upper section contains blue, black, and orange flowers and birds over a pink crisscross pattern; second section contains gray birds amid plants, rocks, and shells; third section contains red, gray, and black curvlinear patterns and shapes with pink and green flowers and resting, gray birds; the fourth and lowest section consists of a red fan with black flowers and yellow trim surrounded by flowers
markings: verso LR, Thomas Murray Collection label: OKI 6065 | verso LR, Jack Lenor Larsen label: 930 19B
medium: Cloth: cotton; bingata (stencil resist with applied pigments)
title: Sample fragment with four different stenciled motifs
